alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:28PM MDT until August 03 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PUEBLO COUNTY... At 526 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northwestern Pueblo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...At 515 PM, a peak wind of 67 mph was measured at the Pueblo Airport. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Pueblo Airport, Boone, Salt Creek, Blende, Avondale and Pueblo Depot. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
